Hey, I've been thinking about the towel and I recalled something that 
sounds very similar to that. This book I have on Japanese language 
and culture mentions something called a haramaki, which is basically 
a waistband or healthband (whichever you prefer). The point of this 
is to keep the abdomen warm, even in hot weather, because it's 
supposed to keep the wearer healthy. Maybe Saito wore the towel 
around his neck for a similar reason?

-MissBehavin
